messages.text: Hi everyone, I'm getting an authentication error when trying to connect to the API. Has anyone seen this before?
What's the exact error message you're seeing?
It says 'Invalid API key provided'. But I just generated a new key yesterday.
Try regenerating the key and make sure you're using the correct environment endpoint.
That worked! Thanks so much. The old key must have been revoked somehow.
How do I set up Docker for local development? I'm new to containers.
Check out our setup guide in the docs. You'll need Docker Desktop installed first.
Perfect, I'll follow that guide. Thanks!
Database connection is timing out in staging environment. Server logs show connection pool exhausted.
Looks like we have a connection leak. I'll investigate the recent database changes.
Found the issue - missing connection.close() in the new user service. Fixing now.
Great catch! Should we add monitoring for connection pool usage?
Yes, I'll add that to our monitoring dashboard.
FYI - We're releasing version 2.1.4 this afternoon. It includes the security patches we discussed.
Thanks for the heads up! Any breaking changes we should know about?
No breaking changes, just bug fixes and security updates. Safe to deploy.
Would it be possible to add a bulk export feature to the dashboard? It would really help with our reporting.
That's a great idea! I'll add it to our feature backlog. What format would you prefer?
CSV would be perfect for our use case. Thanks for considering it!
